interface.name: org.altlinux.alterator.systeminfo1
interface.doc:summary: Expose systeminfo backend methods that provide system data by running /usr/lib/alterator/backends/systeminfo helpers; each method returns stdout and the underlying command response code.

method.name: GetAll
method.doc:summary: Collect consolidated system data in key/value form.
method.doc:detail: Output format: lines KEY="value" ordered as HOSTNAME, OS_NAME, BRANCH, KERNEL, CPU, ARCH, GPU, MEMORY, DRIVE, MOTHERBOARD, MONITOR. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetCPU
method.doc:summary: Return CPU model, logical core count, and frequency via systeminfo cpu.

method.name: GetHostName
method.doc:summary: Return the host name from systeminfo host-name.
method.doc:detail: stdout_strings carries a single hostname string produced by the hostname command. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetDrive
method.doc:summary: Return total storage size via systeminfo drive.
method.doc:detail: Computes the sum of partition sizes from /proc/partitions; stdout_strings holds the size in bytes. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetGPU
method.doc:summary: List VGA adapters reported by systeminfo gpu.
method.doc:detail: Parses lspci output for VGA devices; stdout_strings contains adapter descriptions. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetMemory
method.doc:summary: Report RAM size using systeminfo memory.
method.doc:detail: Calculates MemTotal * 1024 from /proc/meminfo; stdout_strings returns the size in bytes. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetBranch
method.doc:summary: Return the distribution branch via systeminfo branch.
method.doc:detail: Provides the RPM macro %_priority_distbranch value for service use. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetKernel
method.doc:summary: Return the kernel version via systeminfo kernel.
method.doc:detail: Reads /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease; stdout_strings holds the kernel release string. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetOperationSystemName
method.doc:summary: Return a human-readable operating system name via systeminfo os-name.
method.doc:detail: Reads PRETTY_NAME from /etc/os-release; stdout_strings contains the display name. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetLicense
method.doc:summary: Return the license text selected by locale and edition via systeminfo os-license.
method.doc:detail: Search order: /usr/lib/alterator/backends/edition (when alterator-backend-edition-utils is present), then license.<lang>.html in /usr/share/alt-notes, /usr/share/alt-license, /var/lib/install3/licenses; falls back to license.all.html. LC_ALL is unset before execution. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetReleaseNotes
method.doc:summary: Return release notes produced by systeminfo release-notes.
method.doc:detail: Emits HTML or plain-text notes; LC_ALL is unset. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetFinalNotes
method.doc:summary: Return installer final notes via systeminfo final-notes.
method.doc:detail: Provides final hints for installers; LC_ALL is unset. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetArch
method.doc:summary: Return system architecture via systeminfo arch.
method.doc:detail: Reads /proc/sys/kernel/arch; stdout_strings holds the architecture string such as x86_64. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetMonitor
method.doc:summary: List connected monitors and resolutions via systeminfo monitor.
method.doc:detail: Reads /sys/class/drm/*/modes and matches connectors; stdout_strings entries look like card0-HDMI-A-1 1920x1080. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: GetMotherboard
method.doc:summary: Return motherboard vendor, model, and version via systeminfo motherboard.

method.name: GetLocale
method.doc:summary: Return the system locale via systeminfo locale.
method.doc:detail: Reads LANG from /etc/locale.conf; stdout_strings holds the locale string such as ru_RU.UTF-8. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.

method.name: ListDesktopEnvironments
method.doc:summary: List available desktop sessions via systeminfo list-desktop-environments.
method.doc:detail: Iterates .desktop entries for plasma, gnome, mate, cinnamon, xfce; stdout_strings may include CINNAMON, GNOME, KDE<index>, MATE, XFCE entries. Response: 0 — success, != 0 — error.
